name: @microfox/klingai
title: Klingai SDK
description: The Klingai SDK provides a comprehensive set of tools for generating and manipulating images and videos, including features like lip syncing, virtual try-on, and various video effects, all through the Klingai API.

readme_map.title: Klingai SDK
readme_map.description: The full README for the Klingai SDK

all_readmes.description: Initializes a new instance of the Klingai SDK, which provides methods to interact with the Klingai API. This constructor configures the SDK with the necessary authentication credentials.
Submits a task to generate an image based on a textual description. The specific parameters for this function are not yet defined in the SDK's types.
Submits a task to generate a video from a source image. The specific parameters for this function are not yet defined in the SDK's types.
Submits a task to synchronize lip movements in a video with a provided audio track. The specific parameters for this function are not yet defined in the SDK's types.
Retrieves a paginated list of previously submitted image generation tasks.
Retrieves a paginated list of previously submitted image-to-video tasks.
Retrieves a paginated list of previously submitted lip-sync tasks.
Retrieves a paginated list of previously submitted multi-image-to-video tasks.
Retrieves a paginated list of previously submitted text-to-video tasks, allowing you to review your task history.
Retrieves a paginated list of previously submitted video effects tasks.
Retrieves a paginated list of previously submitted video extension tasks.
Retrieves a paginated list of previously submitted virtual try-on tasks.
Submits a task to generate a video from multiple source images. The specific parameters for this function are not yet defined in the SDK's types.
Queries the status and result of a specific image generation task using its unique task ID.
Queries the status and result of a specific image-to-video task using its unique task ID.
Queries the status and result of a specific lip-sync task using its unique task ID.
Queries the status and result of a specific multi-image-to-video task using its unique task ID.
Retrieves the current status and results of a specific text-to-video generation task using its unique task ID.
Queries the status and result of a specific video effects task using its unique task ID.
Queries the status and result of a specific video extension task using its unique task ID.
Queries the status and result of a specific virtual try-on task using its unique task ID.

Submits a task to generate a video based on a textual description (prompt). This asynchronous function allows for detailed customization of the output video, including model selection, aspect ratio, duration, and camera movements.
Submits a task to apply visual effects to a video. The specific parameters for this function are not yet defined in the SDK's types.
Submits a task to extend the duration of an existing video. The specific parameters for this function are not yet defined in the SDK's types.
Submits a task to perform a virtual try-on, superimposing clothing onto a model image. The specific parameters for this function are not yet defined in the SDK's types.

constructors.name: createKlingaiSDK
constructors.description: Create a new Klingai SDK client through which you can interact with the API

requiredKeys.description: Your Klingai access key for API authentication. Obtain it from the Klingai platform.
Your Klingai secret key for generating JWT tokens. Obtain it from the Klingai platform.
